Package com.bitsavior.screens

Class WinScreen

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
com.bitsavior.screens.WinScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class WinScreen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
Screen which is shown after a win

  • Constructor Details

    • WinScreen

      public WinScreen​(ScreenManager screenManager, int timeLeft, int bugsLeft, int gameLevel)
      Creates the win screen
      Parameters:
      screenManager - to access other screens
      timeLeft - time left in seconds
      bugsLeft - number of living/not caught bugs
      gameLevel - level which was completed
